data.meta_description: This 12 song Music Compilation was designed to serve high action, impact energy scenes in TV, Film, Adverts And Video Games. These array of different musicals‚Ä¶
data.text:
HOW MANY OTHER MUSIC COMPOSERS YOU KNOW ARE TALENT IN THE SHOW AND DOING THE MUSIC CUES üôåüèΩü§ûüèΩüíØüèÜ TUNE IN TONIGHT 9/8c "SUMMER HOUSE MARTHA'S VINEYARD" ON BRAVO #COMPOSERS #BRAVO #SUMMERHOUSE #MARTHASVIEYARD #THESYNCRETS #MUSICSUPERVISION #BROOKBROVAZ

ALL OF BIGGIE SMALLS CHILDHOOD FRIENDS & FAMILY + THE BROOK BROVAZ. HIGHLIGHT OF OUR CAREERS, BEING APART OF BIGGIE SMALLS OFFICIAL DOCUMENTARY ON A+E A FEW YEARS BACK. ONE THING WE ALL HAVE IN COMMON AND IN THE WORDS OF THE LATE GREAT FRANK WHITE, "WE SPREAD LOVE IT'S THE BROOKLYN WAY"üóΩ MARCH 9TH BIGGIE DAY CELEBRATIONüêê

SOME MORE CAREER HIGHLIGHTS "SUMMER HOUSE MARTHAS VINEYARD" NOT ONLY DID WE DO SOME SCORES & MUSIC FOR THIS SHOW, WE ALSO GOT A FEW CAMEOS ON THE SHOW. CHECK IT OUT "BRAVO" S/O TO OUR SIS "JORDAN EMANUEL FOR INCLUDING THE HOME TEAM. #BROOKBROVAZ üèÜü•á

GREETINGS LADIES & GENTS: It's Been Awhile Since We Posted Here. We Need To Get Better Over At The LinkedIn Community üòÖ Just Sharing Some Sync Highlights. We Have About 8 Records In " Welcome Home Fanklin" This Was One Means Alot To Us. We Grew Up Off Of Charlie Brown & Snoopy So For Us Participate In Some Of The Music Throughout This Project Is Epic. #Welcomehomefranklin #appletv #syncdid #BrookBrovaz #BKNYC

INTERNATIONAL DANCEHALL SENSATION LAALEE WHO BROUGHT YOU THE VIRAL HIT TIK TOK SONG "BONG BING" "DIRT BOUNCE" "BIRD" TO NAME A FEW IS BACK WITH THE A NEW DANCING DANCEHALL ANTHEM FOR THE YEAR. THIS ONE IS TITLED "NEAT WID IT." PRODUCED BY YOURS TRULY VIDEO OUT ON YOUTUBE AND THE SONG IS ON ALL MAJOR PLATFORMS. CHECK US OUT YALL. DID WE MENTION THAT WE ARE ALL WEST INDIANS SO IT WAS ONLY RIGHT ! üòÅ üíØ https://lnkd.in/eF9DtTNk https://lnkd.in/e4kUphv9 #LAALEE #JAMAICA #DANCEHALL #REMYMARTIN #BROOKLYNNYC #BROOKBROVAZ

It's been awhile LinkedIn but we have been the feild getting to work. What's dope about Bravo's Summer House Marthas Vineyard is that our real life sister Jordan Emanuel, is starring in it and we got to cue some music for the show as well. To top things off, our real life brother has his clothing line (KillBillTheBrand) featured in some episodes too. It's an amazing feeling when the family is winning together. All in one show. üíØüôèüèΩ‚úåüèΩ #SYNCDID #BRAVO #SUMMERHOUSE #MARTHASVINEYARD #NEWYORKCITY #JORDANEMANUEL #BROOKBROVAZ

It's always dope to just be randomly watching a show and hear your music throughout the series. We got the first two score and cue in this minute clip on a show via Netflix: Titled "Saturday Morning All Star Hits"! üôèüèæüíØ #Netflix #MusicSyncLicencing #ComposingArtist #BrookBrovaz

YEAR 2 OUT AS RECORDING ARTIST NOT BAD BUT WE STILL GOT A PLETHORA OF WORK TO DO. THANKS TO ALL THAT ADDED IT TO YOUR PLAYLIST, STREAMED IT, DOWNLOADED AND MADE VIDEOS TO OUR RECORDS YOU ALL ARE APPRECIATED. P.S. WE STILL GET BUSY AS MUSIC PRODUCERS DONT EVER FORGET THAT ü§© #BROOKBROVAZ üíøüíø
